description:
Default permissions for all CombatLedger windows.

core:default grants core:event:listen / core:event:emit / core:event:unlisten so
the Tauri v2 plugin:event|listen IPC calls from @tauri-apps/api/event resolve.
Without this file, plugin-namespaced IPC calls block silently in production builds
even though custom invoke commands (get_config, save_config, â€¦) continue to work.
